about.title: about me
about.description: As a passionate Web Designer and Developer, I specialize in creating visually stunning, user-friendly websites that deliver seamless digital experiences. With a strong foundation in both design aesthetics and technical development, I bridge creativity and functionality to build custom solutions tailored to each clientâ€™s needs.
